name: 蘇倚德
objective:
本課程旨在透過案例研析介紹智慧財產權之理論與實務問題，授課內容將以貼近生活和商業活動的「商標法」為主軸，並針對相應主題補充著作權、專利權及營業秘密等智慧財產法律知識。於學期中邀請數次學界或實務界專家學者，以專題講座方式講授實務案例，以達實務與理論相輔相成的功效。

This course aims to introduce the theory and practical issues of intellectual property rights through case studies. The course will primarily focus on "Trademark Law," which is closely related to everyday life and business activities. Additionally, it will supplement the knowledge of intellectual property laws, such as copyright, patent rights, and trade secrets, on relevant topics. Throughout the semester, several experts and scholars from academia or the industry will be invited to give special lectures on practical cases, aiming to achieve a complementary effect between theory and practice.
